summary: Scientists experimenting with changes in weather on a tropical island get more than they bargained for when Godzilla shows up to battle humongous insects and protect his newborn child.
cast: Tadao Takashima|Akira Kubo|Beverly Maeda|Akihiko Hirata|Yoshio Tsuchiya|Kenji Sahara|Ken'ichirô Maruyama|Seishirô Kuno|Yasuhiko Saijô|Susumu Kurobe|Kazuo Suzuki|Wataru Ômae|Chôtarô Tôgin|Osman Yusuf|Haruo Nakajima|Seiji Onaka|Yû Sekita|'Little Man' Machan
title: El hijo de Godzilla
